title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Strategies for Reusing Adaptive Learning Units

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of pedagogy and comprehension of science curriculum content
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Process mining techniques can be applied to analyze learning flow structures for reusing learning units.
Learner-adaptive rules can be derived through decision tree learning.
Reusable educational content compliant with IMS Learning Design standards can be produced.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
